When it shows up, we're gonna hit it with the ancient machina, and it's bye-bye Sin. The Crusaders' responsibility is to lure Sin and immobilize it. The Al Bhed will deliver the finishing blow. I wish it could be the other way around, but as long as we defeat Sin, who cares. Never mind.

text.Gatta: (Sounding flat) The operation will begin shortly. Please check all your equipment.

text.Wakka: Um, you all right?

text.Gatta: Of course not! I came here to fight Sin! But they stick me here!

text.Auron: If you want to prove yourself ...
first you must complete the tasks you are given.

text.ACTION: (Sags)
[If you encourage Gatta twice to defy orders, he'll die, otherwise Luzzu does.]

CHOICE.Gatta: Just doing what they say? It just won't be enough.

CHOICE.Tidus: Yeah, you should be out on the front lines.

CHOICE.Gatta: That's right! It's not fair!

CHOICE.Tidus: Guarding the command center is important, too.

CHOICE.Gatta: You'd think the same if you were me.
I'll do something ... even if it means bending the rules.

CHOICE.Tidus: Yeah, you should be out on the front lines.

CHOICE.Gatta: That's right! It's not fair!

CHOICE.Tidus: Guarding the command center is important, too.

CHOICE.Gatta: I've got to show Luzzu what I can do. (Runs off)

text.Kinoc: Oh! (Comes over to embrace Auron) I'd heard from Seymour, but I didn't know if we'd actually meet. Good to see you, Auron! Ten years, is it?

text.Lulu: (Whispers to Tidus) That's Wen Kinoc, one of the Four Maesters of Yevon. He leads the warrior monks and also commands the Crusaders.

text.Gatta: (Rushes in and salutes) All troops ready to move at your command, sir!

text.Kinoc: Tell me, Auron. Where have you been the last ten years?

text.Auron: We don't have time for this now, do we?

text.Kinoc: This plan won't work, you know that. We'll just let them dream a little longer.

text.Seymour: (Standing behind them) Lord Kinoc ...

text.Kinoc: I heard that, Auron. A lot has happened the last ten years. What were you doing, and where?

text.Auron: Fulfilling a promise I made to a friend. I still am.

text.Kinoc: Just tell me one thing: Have you seen Zanarkand?

text.Yuna: (To Tidus) I kinda ... think we don't belong here.

text.Base Captain: It is time at last. We must tell the Al Bhed waiting outside to begin the operation at once. The fiends may break through. This place is not safe. Make sure you're prepared to defend yourselves. Tell me when you're ready.

text.Al Bhed in command center: We have the ancient machina. The operation will succeed. Our machina will prove that Yevon's teachings are not the way. A summoner ... I shall report this later. Being around Yevon's followers makes me sick.

CHOICE.Kinoc: Being a maester has its privileges. I can just sit here and watch.

CHOICE.ACTION: Pacing around command center ...

CHOICE.Wakka: With them here, it's like Yevon authorizes this whole operation!

CHOICE.Kimahri: (Stares)

CHOICE.Auron: Go to Yuna.

CHOICE.Lulu: Anything could happen. Make sure you're ready for combat.

CHOICE.Yuna: I'm a little nervous.

text.ACTION: [Kinoc moves to front of observation platform and raises arm.]

text.Base Captain: Sin always returns for its spawn. To make sure, we're going to encourage them to call out to it.

text.Auron: You won't have to. It'll come.

text.Tidus: Narration: I remembered Auron telling me. Sin is my old man. Sin is Jecht.

text.ACTION: [Sinspawn breaks loose]
[Boss battle: Sinspawn Gui.]
The first who makes a physical attack says ...

text.Tidus: Those arms are in the way!

text.Wakka: It blocked my shot, ya? I don't believe it!

text.Auron: So the arms are for defense.

text.ACTION: A few rounds later, someone will notice ...

text.Tidus: It's gonna do something! Time for a head shot!

text.Auron: It's going to attack. Aim for the head!

text.Lulu: I'll cast a spell at its head!

text.Wakka: That, I can hit, eh?

text.ACTION: [Yuna's party dives for cover.]
[Yuna comes to, sees Seymour facing Sinspawn Gui. Auron heads into battle. Yuna follows.]

text.Seymour: Stand back, Lady Yuna.

text.ACTION: [They kill sinspawn]

text.Yuna: The others? (Rushes to edge of cliff)

text.ACTION: [Tidus wakes up, sees scattered bodies of Crusaders.]
Examining bodies on battlefield yields grim epitaphs:

text.Epitaphs: Rest in peace. A peaceful death. Probably had no clue. Still so young. Too late to help them. Slightly warm, but no sign of breathing. Staring at the sky, lifeless. Reclining, breathless. Instant, painless death. Too late to help them.

text.Tidus: (Bellows, runs towards water) Don't you run away from me!

text.Seymour: You won't hurt it. Your powers are still ... too weak.

text.ACTION: [Seymour shakes head; Yuna starts twirling staff for Ifrit]

text.Seymour: You can't!

text.Tidus: Narration: I have no idea what I was thinking when I ran after Sin that day. But before I knew what I was doing, there I was chasing him down like a thief at market. Maybe I was angry, maybe I wanted to go home. I kept thinking of Zanarkand, and my old man.

text.ACTION: [Tidus wakes up on a different part of the beach]
[Glimpse of Yuna dancing]

text.Tidus: Narration: People die, and Yuna dances. When will she stop dancing? When will it stop? Yuna won’t stop dancing– not until Sin is gone. Those were my thoughts then…I think.

text.Auron: (Standing nearby) I see you're still here.
Many stories ended here today ... But ...

text.ACTION: (Walks off)

text.Tidus: Narration: Sin had come and gone, but I remained here.

text.ACTION: (If Tidus talks to party before leaving Djose Shore ... )

text.Lulu: You were in contact with Sin again. The toxin–are you okay? Yuna was worried about you. You should let her know you're all right.

text.ACTION: [Auron facing Kinoc, guards, and Seymour behind them]

text.Auron: Those who turned from Yevon died, while the faithful live on.

text.Kinoc: Hmm. The past ten years have changed you, I see.

text.ACTION: [Yuna bows as he leaves. Seymour approaches.]

text.Seymour: You do not look so well. But now more than ever, you must be the people's strength, their confidence.
Anyone else would be expected to show their sorrow.

text.ACTION: [Glimpse of Wakka giving Yevon bow to row of Crusader corpses]

text.Seymour: But you ... are a summoner. You are Spira's hope. Until Sin is defeated, you must not relent. Do you understand?
Are you afraid?
Yuna, take me as your pillar of strength. As Yunalesca had her lord Zaon.
Lady Yuna. Until next we meet, farewell.

text.Yuna: (Nervous laugh) Maesters are strict. I guess ... I guess I'll just have to do better.

CHOICE.Wakka: You can't ignore the teachings.

CHOICE.Kimahri: (Stares)

CHOICE.Lulu: Rest while you can. We leave soon.

text.Tidus: Yeah, for a while there, I thought I could feel him. But that doesn't mean I believe you.

text.Auron: Sin is Jecht. He came here for you.

text.Tidus: So he killed all those people just for a chance to see me?

text.Auron: That's what Sin does. He wanted to show that to you. Do you know why?

text.Tidus: How am I supposed to know?

text.Auron: So you would kill him. As long as he is Sin, Jecht will keep killing. He wants you to stop him.

text.Tidus: You gotta be kidding. How do you know all of this, anyway?
I'm not done talking to you! Don't you run away!

CHOICE.O'aka: I made a bundle with the operation prices. But the way it turned out, they deserved a better deal. I guess the summoners are our only hope. Huh? You wanna buy something?

CHOICE.Female Crusader in Red: More than half of our frontline soldiers perished. My battalion was annihilated, too ... The Crusaders will never rise again. We shouldn't have defied the teachings.

CHOICE.ACTION: Crusaders being tended by Shelinda ...

CHOICE.Female Crusader: It wasn't supposed to end like this. Damn it! How many died today?

CHOICE.Crusader in green: W ... Water. Give me some water.

CHOICE.Kyou: My wounds are nothing compared to what the others have suffered.

text.ACTION: [Y. turns and waves cheerily to K. and T. as party moves off.]

text.Kimahri: In dark times she must be. She must shine bright.
Now are dark times. Yuna tries hard.
If we worry, she tries harder. Do not frown.

text.ACTION: Talking to pedestrians on Djose Highroad ...

CHOICE.Kyou: The Crusaders have been ordered to regroup at Djose Temple. Not many left to regroup, but ... It's my fault. My men died in vain because of me. It's all my fault. My sergeant's keepsake ... Take it.

CHOICE.Monk in orange: As followers of Yevon, we believe in aiding all those who are wounded. Even the excommunicated Crusaders. They have suffered so much. I believe the time has come to welcome them back.
May Yevon's blessing be with you.
A heartbreaking defeat, it was ... Yevon's blessing has spared us.

CHOICE.Crusader in purple and white: We've decided to rest at the temple. I just hope they let us. We've been excommunicated, after all. They might throw us out.
Oh, I almost forgot. There are fiends here that petrify humans. Wear this; it should help.
My buddy's missing. We served in the same unit. I hope he's okay.

CHOICE.Crusader in green: My comrades are dead, all because we ignored the teachings. Relying on a forbidden machina ... what the heck were we thinking?
This'll hardly make amends, but ... I want the lady summoner to have this.
I guess it's time to seek the monks' help and embrace the teachings once again.

CHOICE.Crusader in purple and green: We incurred heavy casualties in last year's Djose coast defense operation. But even those losses don't compare to this.
I found this lying on the battlefield. Maybe it will be of some use to you.
All I can offer now are my prayers.

text.Tidus: Hey! How much longer till Zanarkand?

text.Wakka: Still a ways.

text.Lulu: First down the Moonflow to the Guado city of Guadosalam ... Then we cross the Thunder Plains to the temple of Macalania.

text.Yuna: (Giggle) And before that, we get to pray at the temple in Djose!

text.Tidus: We can't just skip all that? Can we, huh?

text.Yuna: Mm-mm. I have to pray to the fayth in every temple in order to earn the Final Aeon.

text.Wakka: That's a summoner's training. She's gotta prepare mind and body, all just to get ready for the Final Summoning.

text.Yuna: I'll be fine with you here!

text.ACTION: [All of them move on, except ... ]

text.Tidus: What can I do for you, boss?

text.Auron: Don't tell Yuna you know about Sin and Jecht.
You know her ... She would ... distance herself from you. We do not want that.

text.Tidus: Yeah, but even if I did something, no one would believe me, you know?
Ah ... you have a point. Come to think of it ... did I really have to know about Jecht? What about my feelings?

text.Auron: Better than you finding out at a critical moment, becoming emotional.
(Chuckles) I heard you were quite the crybaby.

text.Tidus:
Narration: Yeah, maybe when I was a kid.
Narration: Maybe a little now. Just a little.
Hey! I still don't buy your story, you hear?

text.ACTION: [Yuna and companions cross bridges leading to temple]
[Ground shakes]

text.Lucil: (Salutes) Yuna, it is good to see you and your companions are well.

text.Yuna: Yourselves as well, Captain. We were worried. Praise be to Yevon! (Yevon bow)

text.Lucil: We escaped with our lives, but our troops were decimated.

text.Elma: Of all our chocobos, only this one made it.

text.Clasko: We make pretty poor Chocobo Mounted Forces without chocobos.

text.Lucil: We turned our backs on the teachings and cast away our faith. This ... this is our just reward.

CHOICE.Elma: It's just you, now. But don't worry, we're here for you!

CHOICE.Lucil: So may died in vain ... It was a mistake.

CHOICE.Clasko: We should never have ignored the teachings.

text.ACTION: [Pause to watch rocks of temple break apart and rise]

text.Lulu: The Lightning Mushroom Rock. It only opens when a summoner is addressing the fayth.

text.Wakka: That means another summoner's already in there.

text.ACTION: [Gatta or Luzzu are to right of Djose temple doors, depending on which one died at Operation Mi’ihen.

CHOICE.ACTION: The Djose knights gather outside the temple ... (you may have to enter and exit this area first)

CHOICE.Lucil: I would pray for those fallen in battle ... But how? How can I enter the temple, after what we have done? The monks of Djose have kindly offered to heal our wounded. Yevon still looks out for us ... Even now. Will Yevon forgive us?(Yevon bow)

CHOICE.Clasko: I've been thinking about the future.
No matter what we do next ... we're going to do it for Yevon, that's for sure.

CHOICE.ACTION: (Yevon bow)

CHOICE.Elma: The monks said we could stay here for a while.
This little fella's finally calmed down.

CHOICE.ACTION: (Chocobo: Kweh.)

CHOICE.Elma: We won't defy Yevon. Never again.

text.LOCATION: Inside inn next to the temple

CHOICE.Nun: I'm sorry, but our beds are all taken by the wounded. You can stay if you don't mind sleeping on the floor. Would you care to rest?

CHOICE.ACTION: If Tidus talks to her behind the counter ...

CHOICE.Elma: Ahem. Sir, if you don't mind ...

CHOICE.Monk at inner door: The wounded are fighting to stay in this world. We have done all we can. They must not be disturbed.

CHOICE.ACTION: [Just inside doors of temple]

CHOICE.Auron: So you're a champion of Yevon now, Braska?

text.ACTION: [Isaaru and brothers emerge from Cloister of Trials]

text.Isaaru: I beg your pardon, but may I ask your name?

text.Yuna: I am Summoner Yuna, from the isle of Besaid. (Deep Yevon bow)

text.Isaaru: As I thought! The daughter of Lord Braska. You have the look of your father.
No, I have never met the man. Ah, my apologies. (Yevon bow) I am Isaaru. I am a summoner, like you.

text.Pacce: I'm Pacce. Pleased to meet you. : And I'm Maroda. I'm guarding my big brother here. Isaaru: Since I was a child, I've always looked up to Lord Braska. I wished I would someday become a high summoner like he was. Isaaru: You must have some of your father's talent in you! I believe you might someday defeat Sin.

text.Maroda: I'm Pacce. Pleased to meet you. : And I'm Maroda. I'm guarding my big brother here. Isaaru: Since I was a child, I've always looked up to Lord Braska. I wished I would someday become a high summoner like he was. Isaaru: You must have some of your father's talent in you! I believe you might someday defeat Sin.

text.Yuna: I ... I'm not really ... I've only just become a summoner.

text.Isaaru: (Smiles) Of course, I've no intention of losing, either. So perhaps we should race to see who can defeat Sin first, no?

text.Yuna: Very well, then. I accept your challenge.

text.Isaaru: Yuna, I beg your leave. Good luck, to both of us!

text.ACTION: If Tidus talks to Isaaru's party before climbing stairs to Cloister of Trials ...

The Qactuars were thus sealed into stone, fated to face lightning day and night. Unless someone again links the (□) sign and releases the seal, they shall suffer within the stone for their deeds. oh, yeah, Clasko's back there with the chocobo. Stop and say hi if you've got the time.

text.ACTION: [The party climbs a little farther, and ... ]

text.Biran: Summoner Yuna!

text.ACTION: [Yenke and Biran start Hymn of the Fayth. Other Ronso warriors march up and join in. Yuna bows to them, then it's time to climb.]

text.Yenke: Behind cliff on lower slopes, you can find ...

CHOICE.ACTION: Near start of trail ...

CHOICE.Lulu: These mark the graves of summoners and guardians who failed.

CHOICE.ACTION: Another cairn further up the trail ...

CHOICE.Lulu: Summoners that die up here ... aren't sent to the Farplane.
Who would send them? They die alone.
Many have become fiends, and they may want Yuna's company.
(Sigh) You're right.

CHOICE.ACTION: Gravesite near the top ...

CHOICE.Lulu: All this way, only to fail. It must have been tough.

CHOICE.Wantz: Greetings, Lady Yuna. My name is Wantz.

CHOICE.Yuna: We have met several times before, right?

CHOICE.Wantz: I have to carry on my brother's business. You've met him, I think. O'aka XXIII, merchant extraordinaire?
Mm. (Nods) My brother wanted to come help Lady Yuna. But the temple imprisoned him for helping traitors.

CHOICE.Tidus: They imprisoned him because of us?

CHOICE.Wantz: He doesn't regret it, though. In fact, he told me before they took him ... "Don't worry about me, just go help Lady Yuna."

CHOICE.Yuna: But, why would your brother do this for us?

CHOICE.ACTION: (Hangs head)

CHOICE.Yenke: Well ... Hey, this isn't the time for talking! There's dealing to be done!

CHOICE.Yuna: I will be sure to keep your brother in my prayers.

CHOICE.Wantz: He's doing the same for you, Lady Yuna.

CHOICE.Yuna: Thanks.

text.Rikku: Zanarkand is on the other side, you know?
Yunie is gonna get the Final Aeon, you know?
I still haven't thought of anything.
What are we gonna do?

text.Tidus: We'll do something! We just don't know enough yet. Until we do, we really can't help Yuna. Let's got to Zanarkand. We'll find something there. It'll all come together. I know it!

text.Rikku: Hey ...
Just now you sounded like a leader, you know?

text.Tidus: Star of the Zanarkand Abes! Didn't anyone tell you?

text.Rikku: A-haa! (Mock-bows) Huh?

text.ACTION: [Seymour is standing behind them.]

text.Seymour: Ah, the son of Jecht.

text.Tidus: Rikku, run ahead and tell Auron!

text.Rikku: You are not fighting him alone!
(Runs off)

text.Seymour: Now is your time to die. Prepare yourself, son of Jecht.

text.Tidus: Not if I can help it!

text.ACTION: [The rest of the party rushes back]

text.Seymour: Lady Yuna, it is a pleasure.

text.Lulu: Yuna!

text.Seymour: A sending, so soon? Allow me to say something to the last Ronso before I leave. (Cackle) Yours was ... truly a gallant race. They threw themselves at me to bar my path. One ... after another ... (Cackle)
You could end the suffering of this poor Ronso.

Allow Kimahri to die, and release him from his pain. Spira ... is a land of suffering and sorrow caught in a spiral of death. To destroy–to heal–Spira, I will become Sin. Yes, with your help. Come with me, Yuna.
Once I have become the next Sin, your father will be freed again.

text.Tidus: (Sags, then rallies) What do you know?

text.ACTION: [Seymour turns into Bigger Badder Nasty]

text.Seymour: Pitiful mortal. Your hope ends here. And you meaningless existence with it.

CHOICE.ACTION: Trigger Command: Talk

CHOICE.Kimahri: You have angered Kimahri! The spirits of the Ronso will guide Kimahri's spear!

CHOICE.Seymour: Do you not want to heal Spira's sorrow? Let death carry you off into peaceful slumber.

CHOICE.Yuna: You can't run from your fate!

text.ACTION: [After defeating Seymour]
[The party starts to head out, but ... ]

text.Yuna: He will become Sin ... with my help.
If he becomes Sin, Sir Jecht will be saved.

text.Tidus: (Hangs his head) Sin's ... my old man.

text.Wakka: You hit your head?

text.Tidus: Sin is my old man. My old man became Sin! I don't know how or why he did it. I felt him, inside. And when I did, I knew it was true. My old man is Spira's suffering. Sorry.

text.Yuna: Even ... knowing that Sin is your father ... Still, you know, I must ...

text.Tidus: I know. Let's get him. I think my old man would want that.

text.Lulu: You'd fight your own father?

text.Wakka: Uh ... 'Bout your old man ... You sure this ain't some kinda bad toxin dream or something?
Then, Chappu ... I, uh ... I think I'll just pretend I didn't hear nothing. I'm getting a little confused, ya? Why ... Why'd all this have to happen?

text.Auron: We'll learn when we arrive. Soon.

text.Wakka: Wh-What are those?

text.Yuna: Those are fayth. A summoning! Someone is using these fayth! Someone is drawing energy from all of them!

text.Rikku: This many?

text.Lulu: Who wields power on this scale, and what could they be calling?

text.Rikku: (To Auron) Hey, you know something, don't you? Spill the beans!

text.Auron: Look not to others for knowledge. This is your journey, too.

text.Rikku: Yunie might die, you know?
Huh?

text.Tidus: This is our ... This is my story.

text.ACTION: (Goes up to wall and touches it ... )
(Pulled in)
[Tidus wakes up on the dock of his houseboat]
[Enters and finds his own room. Creepy Little Kid ™ appears.]

text.Bahamut's Fayth: Welcome home.
Remember me? We met in Bevelle.
But that wasn't the first time we met. I've known about you for a long time. A long, long time.

text.Tidus: I ... I feel like I know you, too. Where are we?

text.Bahamut's Fayth: (Chuckles) Silly, don't recognize your own home?

text.ACTION: [Creepy kid vanishes and ghostly images of Wakka and Rikku appear]

text.Wakka: What's gotten into you? Hey!

text.Rikku: Wake up! Wake up!

text.Bahamut's Fayth: (Runs back in) Precisely.

text.Tidus: A dream? Are you crazy? I don't have time to be dreaming now!

text.Bahamut's Fayth: You're wrong. It's not that you're dreaming. You are a dream.

text.ACTION: [Creepy Little Kid runs outside. Tidus finds him on upper deck.]

text.Bahamut's Fayth: Long ago, there was a war.

Yes. A war between Zanarkand and Bevelle. Bevelle's machina assured their victory from the start. Spira had never seen such power. The summoners of Zanarkand didn't stand a chance. Zanarkand was doomed to oblivion. That's why we tried to save it–if only in a memory.
The remaining summoners and the townspeople that survived the war ... They all became fayth– fayth for the summoning.
No. I mean this place. A Zanarkand that never sleeps.
The dreams of the fayth summoned the memories of the city. They summoned all the buildings, all the people who lived there.

text.Tidus: The people ... What, they're all dreams? Me, too?

text.Bahamut's Fayth: Yes, you're a dream of the fayth. You, your father, your mother, everyone. All dreams. And if the fayth stop dreaming ...

text.ACTION: [Zanarkand vanishes; all that's left is melted bits of dock and houseboat]

text.Tidus: So what if I'm a dream! I ... I like being here.

text.Bahamut's Fayth: We've been dreaming so long ... we're tired. Would you and your father ... Would you let us rest? Both you and your father have been touched by Sin. Sin, the one around whom all Spira–the spiral–revolves.
You two are more than just dreams now.

text.Yuna: (fleeting image) Wake up! Wake up, please!

text.Bahamut's Fayth: Just a little more, and maybe ... Maybe you are the dream that will end our dreaming at last.

text.ACTION: [Tidus wakes up with friends clustered around him]

text.Rikku: Hey! We were so worried about you!

text.Lulu: You okay?

text.Tidus: Nothing ... I blacked out. I was dreaming. You called me ... and I woke up. (Stretches with exaggerated nonchalance) Nothing like a good nap! Well, I'm ready. Let's go!

text.ACTION: [The party comes to a flooded tunnel]

text.Wakka: Looks like we got a job to do, ya?

text.Lulu: If anything should happen in the water, we're relying on you three. If it gets dangerous, pull out quick.

text.Wakka: Right!

text.ACTION: [Near exit]

text.Auron: They'll be upon us soon. She has sent fiends to test our summoner's strength.
In Zanarkand, she awaits the arrival of the strongest.
As much as Mika and Seymour.

text.Yuna: Then ... I must not let him down.

text.ACTION: [Exiting cave ... ]
[They defeat another Big Nasty]

text.Rikku: Hey! Can't we rest a little?

text.Auron: No need. We reach the summit soon.

text.Rikku: I know, that's why I want to stop for a bit. Soon means that ... there's not much time left.
Fine. I'll think on the way.

text.Wakka: Hey, come on, let's go.

text.Tidus: We are almost there, aren't we?

text.Wakka: We've come a long way.

text.Auron: You remind me of myself. Before, the closer I came to Zanarkand, the more I wondered ... when we arrive, Braska will call the Final Aeon ... He will fight Sin, then die. I thought my mind was made up long before. But when I stood here, my resolve wavered.

text.Wakka: Huh, never would've figured. Legendary guardians choke sometimes, too, ya?

text.Auron: (Snort) Legendary guardian? I was just a boy. A boy about your age, actually. I wanted to change the world, too. But I changed nothing. That is my story.

text.ACTION: [The party pauses and looks out.]

text.Tidus: Narration: My thoughts, they kept floating up, and then slipping through my fingers. Slipping away before I could pin them down with words.

text.Rikku: Yuna, I say no! If we go down there, then you'll ...

text.Yuna: Rikku. You're a true friend, and I thank you, but ... I must go ... down, to Zanarkand.

text.Rikku: I'm not saying we shouldn't go. But shouldn't we think about it some more? There's gotta be some kind of way we can save you, Yuna!

text.Yuna: All my life, I knew this moment would come.

text.Rikku: Yunie ...

text.ACTION: [Yuna hugs her, and a sphere slips from the folds of her kimono]

text.Yuna: Thank you, Rikku. Thank you for everything.

text.Rikku: Don't say that, Yunie! It's not over yet!
No ... You can tell him yourself.
Yunie, don't say that because ... we're gonna see each other again, okay?

text.ACTION: If Tidus picks up Yuna's sphere and listens to it, he hears the sound of the sea, then ...
[Party gathered around campfire at sunset. Tidus climbs hill, gazes at ruins.]

text.Tidus: Narration: Listen to my story. This may be our last chance.

text.ACTION: [Sitting around fire after nightfall ... ]

text.Tidus: Hey! There was more, right? I mean like that time ... uh ... Anyone?

text.Yuna: I think that we should stop ... maybe. For now.

text.ACTION: [They pick up their weapons.]

text.Tidus: (The implication is that until now, the entire game has been shared memories, the party recollecting their adventures around the campfire. Tidus' narrator voiceovers stop at this point.)

text.ACTION: [A river of pyreflies floats overhead]

text.Wakka: Looks like the Farplane.

text.Dome Gatekeeper: Journeyer of the long road, name yourself.

text.Yuna: I am the summoner Yuna. I have come from the island of Besaid.

text.Dome Gatekeeper: Your eyes, my dear. Show me the long road you have travelled. Very good. You have journeyed well. Lady Yunalesca will surely welcome your arrival. Go to her now, and bring your guardians with you. Go.

text.ACTION: [Inside the dome, various glimpses of past summoner parties appear as they travel the catwalks]

text.Rikku: What ... what was that?

text.Lulu: She said "Lady Yocun," didn't she? Wait! She guarded High Summoner Yocun?

text.Auron: This dome is filled with pyreflies. It's like one gigantic sphere. People's thoughts remain here. Forever.

text.Wakka: Hey, wasn't that ... ?

text.Rikku: Seymour?

text.ACTION: [After slogging their way through another boss fight]

text.Yuna: The hall of the Final Summoning.

text.ACTION: [Yuna takes the lift down. Again, we hear an echo of the past ... ]

text.Jecht: Huh? What do you mean no Final Aeon?

text.ACTION: [Party goes down ... ]

text.Yuna: This isn't a fayth. It's just an empty statue.

text.Dome Gatekeeper: (Appearing) That statue lost its power as a fayth long ago. It is Lord Zaon, the first fayth of the Final Summoning. What you see before you is all that remains of him. Lord Zaon is ... his soul is gone.

text.Wakka: Gone!?

text.Rikku: You mean, there is no Final Aeon?

text.Dome Gatekeeper: But fear not. Lady Yunalesca will show you the path. The Final Aeon will be yours. The summoner and the Final Aeon will join powers. Go to her now. Inside, the lady awaits. (Makes symbol of Yevon and vanishes)

text.Tidus: Yuna, wait! Auron, you knew this was going to happen, didn't you?

text.Rikku: Why didn't you tell us!?

text.Auron: If I had told you the truth, would that really have stopped you from coming?

text.Kimahri: Kimahri knows. Kimahri go first. Yuna is safe. Kimahri protect.

text.Rikku: Someone's coming!

text.Yunalesca: Welcome to Zanarkand. I congratulate you, summoner. You have completed your pilgrimage. I will now bestow you with that which you seek. The Final Summoning ... will be yours. Now, choose.
You must choose the one whom I will change ... to become the fayth of the Final Summoning.

text.ACTION: [They gasp]

text.Yunalesca: There must be a bond, between chosen and summoner, for that is what the Final Summoning embodies: the bond between husband and wife, mother and child, or between friends. If that bond is strong enough, its light will conquer Sin. A thousand years ago, I chose my husband Zaon as my fayth. Our bond was true, and I obtained the Final Aeon. There is nothing to fear. You will soon be freed of worry and pain. For once you call forth the Final Aeon, your life will end. Death is the ultimate and final liberation. Your father, Braska, chose this path.

text.ACTION: (Leaves)

text.Wakka: But how? What, you got a plan now?

text.Lulu: If one of us has to become a fayth ... I volunteer.

text.Wakka: Me too, Yuna!

text.Tidus: Tidus: That still won't change anything, you know? You'd bring the Calm, and then what? That won't break the cycle!

text.Wakka: Listen ... You wanna defeat Sin and keep Yuna alive ... You don't want Sin to come back, ya? That is just not gonna happen, brudda, you know?

text.Lulu: If you want everything, you'll end up with nothing.

text.Wakka: Now you're being childish!

text.Tidus: I give up. So what would an adult do, then? They know they can just throw away a summoner, then they can do whatever they like. You're right, I might not even have a chance. But no way am I gonna just stand here and let Yuna go. And what Auron said about there being a way ... I think it's true.

text.Rikku: "You'll think of something"?

text.Tidus: Yes. I'll go ask Yunalesca. She's got to know something.

text.Rikku: You really think she'll help you?

text.Tidus: I don't know, but I have to try. This is my story. It'll go the way I want it ... or I'll end it here.

text.Yuna: Wait. You say it's your story, but it's my story, too, you know? It would be so easy ... to let my fate just carry me away ... following this same path my whole life through. But I know ... I can't. What I do, I do ... with no regrets.

text.ACTION: [She passes through doors; they follow]

text.Yunalesca: Have you chosen the one to become your fayth? Who will it be?

text.Yuna: Might I ask something first? Will Sin come back even should I use the Final Summoning to defeat it?

text.Yunalesca: Sin is eternal. Every aeon that defeats it becomes Sin in its place ... And thus is Sin reborn.

text.Tidus: So that's why Jecht became Sin.

text.Yunalesca: Sin is an inevitable part of Spira's destiny. It is neverending.

text.Wakka: Neverending? But ... but ... if we atone for our crimes, Sin will stop coming back, ya? Someday, it'll be gone, ya?

text.Yunalesca: Will humanity ever attain such purity?

text.Wakka: Uh ...

text.Lulu: This ... this cannot be! The teachings state that we can exorcise Sin with complete atonement! It's been our only hope all these years!

text.Yunalesca: Hope is ... comforting. It allows us to accept fate, however tragic it might be.

Yevon's teachings and the Final Summoning give the people of Spira hope. Without hope, they would drown in their sorrow. Now, choose. Who will be your fayth? Who will be the one to renew Spira's hope?

text.Yuna: No one. I would have gladly died. I live for the people of Spira, and would have gladly died for them. But no more! The Final Summoning ... is a false tradition that should be thrown away.

text.Yunalesca: No. It is our only hope. Your father sacrificed himself to give that hope to the people. So they would forget sorrow.

text.Yuna: Wrong. My father ... My father wanted ... to make Spira's sorrow go away. Not just cover it up with lies!

text.Yunalesca: Sorrow cannot be abolished. It is meaningless to try.

text.Yuna: My father ... I loved him. So I ... I will live with my sorrow, I will live my own life! I will defeat sorrow, in his place. I will stand my ground and be strong. I don't know when it will be but someday, I will conquer it. And I will do it without ... false hope.

text.Yunalesca: Poor creature. You would throw away hope. Well ... I will free you before you can drown in your sorrow. It is better for you to die in hope than to live in despair. Let me be your liberator.

text.Auron: Now! This is it! Now is the time to choose! Die and be free of pain or live and fight your sorrow! Now is the time to shape your stories! Your fate is in your hands!

text.Kimahri: Yuna needs Kimahri. Kimahri protect Yuna.

text.Rikku: Well, I'm fighting!

text.Wakka: I can't believe we're gonna fight Lady Yunalesca! Gimme a break!

text.Lulu: You can always run.

text.Wakka: Hah! I'd never forgive myself–no way! Not if I ran away now. Even in death, ya!

text.Lulu: My thoughts exactly.

text.Tidus: Yuna! This is our story! Now let's see this thing through together.

text.ACTION: [They beat the stuffing out of Yunalesca]

text.Yunalesca: If I die, so does the Final Aeon. And with it, Spira's only hope.

text.Tidus: Then we'll find Spira a new hope!

text.Yunalesca: Fool. There is no other way. Even if there was ... Even if you did destroy Sin ... Yu Yevon the immortal would only create Sin anew.
Ah ... Zaon ... Forgive me ... Spira has been robbed of the light of hope ... All that remains is sorrow. (Dissolves)

text.Yuna: I cannot believe what we just did.

text.Rikku: What?

text.Tidus: Destroy Sin. So it won't come back, and without the Final Aeon. I don't know how just yet. But I'll find out.

text.ACTION: [On the way out, Auron and Tidus hang back.]

text.Auron: There is something you should know.

text.Tidus: I know ... it's about you, right?

text.Auron: I am also an unsent. You are not surprised?

text.Tidus: I think I kinda knew. It was Yunalesca, wasn't it?

text.Auron: When Braska and Jecht died defeating Sin ... I just couldn't accept it. I came back here ... tried to avenge them. But she struck me down. Somehow I made my way, crawling, down Mount Gagazet. But my strength left me just outside Bevelle. That's where Kimahri found me. I told him about Yuna ... just before I died. I've been wandering ever since, never going to the Farplane.
Don't make that face. Being dead has its advantages. I was able to ride Sin and go to your Zanarkand.

text.Tidus: And you've been watching over me since then, haven't you? Why? What's the big idea? Why me?

text.Auron: It is one of those things that is difficult to explain. Very well, I will show you. My memories.

text.ACTION: (Kneels, dissolves into pyreflies)

text.Tidus: Dad? I know. The Final Summoning's gone. But I'll think of something! Just give me a little more time!

text.ACTION: [Yuna's party gathers, quiet and shellshocked]

text.Cid: Aren't we the happy lookin' bunch.

text.Rikku: "Where, where?" That all you can say? Why don't you think of something!?

text.Auron: What do we know ... Sin is Jecht. Thus, you have a link ... a bond with Sin. That may be our key.

text.ACTION: [Yuna approaches Cid, bows low. His back is turned when she rises, so she doesn't see he's fighting tears. She leaves bridge with Kimahri.]

text.Rikku: Hmm ... uuuuhh ... Still thinking.

CHOICE.Wakka: So much for the Final Aeon solving everything.

CHOICE.Lulu: We need to sit and think this through. There has to be a way!

CHOICE.Cid: We'll wait till you think of a plan. Get that noggin working!

CHOICE.Auron: Rush this and we lose everything. We need to plan carefully.

text.LOCATION: Ramp down to Airship Level Four

CHOICE.Female blitzer: I wonder, where will the airship go from here?

CHOICE.Judda: You are a traitor, no? Then you are one with the Al Bhed!

CHOICE.Blappa: That was first time being so close to Sin!

CHOICE.Eigaar: I long for the sands of Bikanel. Desert it may be, but there is no place like home! The lord Mika, an unsent? But I saw him in Luca.

CHOICE.Berrik: Yevon found the place of our Home. Perhaps we were followed?

CHOICE.Nimrook: I must train or the airship will rob me of my muscles!

CHOICE.Brother: I have to warn you, thinking is not my forte. So if you want a plan, go to someone else. I have to fly the airship now. Goodbye.

CHOICE.ACTION: [Rin cycles through 5 sales pitches now ... he started doing this right before Evrae battle.]

CHOICE.Rin: May I help you? Welcome! Rin's Aerial Branch office at your service. Welcome! How may I assist you today?

CHOICE.ACTION: [Store transactions]

CHOICE.Rin: Thank you. Your patronage is very much appreciated.

CHOICE.Woman in bikini: These things belong to Mister Rin. They are not yours to take!

CHOICE.Man in gas mask: We don't know how Sin will react.

CHOICE.Man doing squats in back: I finally have figured out how it is that this ship is moved.

CHOICE.Woman in leggings: We left kids on the ground. Safer for them.

CHOICE.Man in a gas mask: The Sin I saw in the ruins was calm. Why is this?

CHOICE.Keyakku clone: With this ship, revenge against the followers of Yevon will be ours.

text.Yuna: All this time, I've been thinking about how to defeat Sin. But I ... Beyond the teachings of Yevon, I ... I know nothing. I'm sorry.

text.Kimahri: Apology is running. Yuna never run away.

text.Tidus: So, uh, Kimahri ... You got any good ideas?

text.Yuna: The teachings won't help us fight Sin.

text.Kimahri: No answer in the teachings, answers lie outside. Must know both sides to find answer.
Mika knows much. Find him, make him talk.

text.ACTION: When Tidus returns ...

text.Wakka: Hey, guys! I just had a great idea!

text.Rikku: (Hand over Wakka's mouth) It was my idea. Let me tell them!

text.Wakka: (Shoves in front of her) It's like this, ya?

text.Rikku: (Shoves in front of him) I just thought!

text.Lulu: The Hymn is the key.

text.ACTION: [Wakka and Rikku groan indignantly]

text.Lulu: Sir Jecht likes the Hymn of the Fayth, correct?

text.Rikku: That's why he was listening to it in Macalania!

text.Lulu: Sin ... violence incarnate, listening peacefully.

text.Wakka: Uh ... I know it's your old man, and I don't mean no disrespect, but ...

text.Tidus: No, it's fine. I've gotten used to it.

text.Lulu: Let me say it. If we attack Sin head-on, we've little chance of winning. However, if he hears the Hymn of the Fayth, he will become docile.

text.Wakka: Yeah, and that's when we make our move! Might be against the rules and all, but who's keeping track, ya? Ya?

text.Rikku: Yeah! It could really work!

text.Tidus: Yeah ... Yeah, it's worth a try!

text.ACTION: When Tidus talks to Cid ...

text.Cid: Well, that sounds like a plan to me! My baby here'll take us anywhere we want! Yee-hah! Here we go!

text.Wakka: I got a good feeling 'bout this!

CHOICE.Lulu: Well, I guess it's all or nothing.

CHOICE.Rikku: It really was my idea, you know.

CHOICE.Auron: Let's see what Mika does now.

CHOICE.Yuna: To Bevelle, then?

CHOICE.Tidus: Through the front door! You worried?

CHOICE.Yuna: I'll be fine. We can't stop now.
Maybe we'll find answers in Bevelle.

CHOICE.Kimahri: Kimahri doubts Mika welcomes us.

CHOICE.Tidus: He'll have to run pretty fast to beat this airship!

CHOICE.Kimahri: We cannot chase if we cannot see.
We must go to Bevelle.

text.ACTION: [Let's BACKTRACK to see what's happening in Spira. Or, if you prefer, skip ahead to visit Mika immediately.]
There's a Jecht sphere lying near Besaid temple ...
There's a Jecht sphere in the wheelhouse ...
(Found outside the Aurochs' locker room.)
(Found lying at the end of the Mi'ihen Oldroad, under the chocobo corral)
Found lying near the lift to Operation Mi'ihen Command Center
(Found beside South Wharf Pavillion)
Once you have full control of the airship, you can also reach ...
[Two warrior monks with rifles bar the palace doors]

text.Wakka: (Facepalm) Man, don't these guys ever give up?

text.Warrior Monk: You'll regret showing your face here! We'll strike you down in the name of Yevon!

text.Tidus: Blah, blah, blah. Yeah, so? Guys?

text.Rikku: If they want a fight, let's give 'em one!

text.Shelinda: Stop! (Emerges from front gate)
Lady Yuna is not to be harmed! She's no traitor! That is an evil rumor spread by the Al Bhed!

text.Rikku: What?

text.Shelinda: Maester Mika himself told me.

text.Warrior Monk: Then ... what are we to do?

text.Rikku: (Credible imitation of Shelinda) Stand down!

text.Shelinda: As she says!

text.ACTION: [The monks step aside]

text.Rikku: What was that about evil Al Bhed?

text.Shelinda: I ... Truly, I do not understand it myself. All Yevon seems to be in a state of confusion. Why, yesterday they called me out of the blue and made me captain of the guard!

Yes, the chaos in the temples is worse than I'd imagined. It's horrible! And all the priests do is blame each other. I worry what will become of Yevon. But no! I must be the rock that stands against the swirling tides, right? Lady Yuna, I must tell you, your courage has been a great inspiration to me.

text.Tidus: Yeah, that's great, but we came here to see Maester Mika. Is he here?

text.Shelinda: Yes, I shall arrange an audience. Please wait in the courtroom. (Hurries off)

text.Rikku: Hey, hey, wait! What was all that about the Al Bhed lying and stuff?

text.Auron: Simple. Yuna has become Mika's only hope.

text.Rikku: Oh ... Okay.

text.Lulu: Just what does he think he can get away with?

text.Tidus: Time to teach him some manners!

text.Mika: Why are you here? You must go and defeat Sin, quickly! You have obtained the Final Aeon from Yunalesca, have you not?

text.Auron: Summoners and guardians will be sacrificed for the Final Summoning no more!

text.Mika: You have profaned and subverted a thousand-year-old tradition? Fools! Infants! Do you realize what you've done? You've taken away the only means of calming Sin!

text.Tidus: Hey, maybe that's not the only way! We think we've got another.

text.Mika: Why ... Preposterous! There is no other way!
Spira has lost its only hope. Destruction is inevitable. Yu Yevon's spiral of death will consume us all. I have no desire to watch Spira die.

text.Tidus: Who is this Yu Yevon guy?

text.Lulu: Lady Yunalesca also mentioned him.

text.Rikku: Wait, gramps! Who's Yu Yevon?

text.Mika: He who crafts the souls of the dead into unholy armor. An armor called Sin. Clad in it, Yu Yevon is invincible. And the only thing that could have pierced that armor, you have destroyed! Nothing can stop it now. (Dissolves into pyreflies)

text.Wakka: Bah! Disappear on us, will ya? Rotten son of a shoopuf!

text.Shelinda: (Entering) Where ... where is the grand maester?

text.Auron: He's not here yet. How long must we wait?

text.Shelinda: That's odd ... I'll go look for His Grace. (Leaves)

text.ACTION: [Creepy Little Kid ™ appears]

text.Bahamut's Fayth: Come, to my room.

text.ACTION: [He disappears]

text.Wakka: Who you talking to?

text.Yuna: I must go see the fayth.

text.Bahamut's Fayth: Hello.

text.Yuna: I must thank you for the aeon. (Deep bow)

text.Bahamut's Fayth: So, have you found a way to truly defeat Sin?

CHOICE.Bahamut's Fayth: Well, come see me when you do. We'll talk then.

text.Shelinda: (Running in) I'm afraid the grand maester is nowhere to be found!
Oh ... I see.

text.Rikku: Hey! Maybe you could help us with the hymn.
It's like, we need you to tell as many people as you can.

text.Shelinda: What should I tell them?

text.Rikku: A ship in the sky will sing the Hymn of the Fayth. When they hear it, we need everyone to sing along!

text.Wakka: Everyone in Spira!

text.Shelinda: I'm not sure I understand.

text.Rikku: You don't have to! Just tell everyone!

text.Shelinda: A ship in the sky will sing the Hymn of the Fayth? So when they hear it, everyone should sing along, correct?

text.Tidus: If they do, we might be able to defeat Sin!

text.Shelinda: Truly?
That's wonderful! You can count on me! I shall tell all of Spira!

text.ACTION: Talking to party after visiting Mika…

CHOICE.Auron: I must admit I was worried at the beginning, but you've done well. One more trial to pass. Our stories will end together. Don't keep Jecht waiting. He never was a patient man.

CHOICE.Yuna: All those teachings ... what were they for? Sorry, I was just thinking. We're ... still going forward, right? We can think about what will happen after we beat Sin, right?

CHOICE.Lulu: We'll be bringing a new Calm. One that will last forever. This will be a battle unmatched in the thousand years since Sin's birth. Spira without Sin ... hmm. Why is it so hard to imagine? Afterwards–after we defeat Sin–promise you'll stay with Yuna.

CHOICE.Rikku: My pop says he's got a special surprise for Sin. Can't wait till this is over so we can relax for a change! Don't worry, we'll be fine! Everyone'll sing for us, I know it!

CHOICE.Wakka: There's something I want to say before the fight. (Turns to Cid) I ... uh ... I guess I didn't know anything about the Al Bhed. Didn't know anything. Didn't want to listen to anything. I was a big jerk. So, I ... Well, uh ... (Half-slumps, half-bows) I'm sorry, ya? Please forgive me.

CHOICE.Cid: Don't let it bother you. Hey, I'm guilty of hating those durn Yevonites, myself! Well ... There's a lot of folk in this world–some of 'em good, some of 'em bad. That's all there is to it.

CHOICE.Rikku: Aww ... now I'm feeling all warm inside.

CHOICE.Wakka: When this is all over, we'll help you look for your Zanarkand! A Spira without Sin ... Hard to imagine, ya?

CHOICE.Kimahri: You keep walking path forward. Kimahri watch the rear. Because of you, Yuna still smiles. Thank you. Friends have saved Kimahri's life. Kimahri will treasure it. Kimahri is ready. Let us fight Sin.

text.ACTION: When you talk to Cid ...

text.Cid: The final showdown with Sin! I say let's get this show on the road!
Yee-haw! Here we go!

text.ACTION: After visiting Mika in Bevelle, you are no longer chased out of the temples ... except that Besaid Village and Macalania Temple are still off-limits until you defeat the Dark Aeons blocking the way.]
And while we're talking to Fayth, we might as well speak to ...
After you talk to Cid and pick "Sin" as destination ...

text.Cid: Well, this is it, eh?

text.Tidus: Yu Yevon's hiding somewhere inside Sin, and we're gonna find him.

text.Cid: Well, that sounds pretty simple.

text.Tidus: Hey! Simple is the way you like it, right?

text.Cid: You got that right.

text.Rikku: Pops! I'm countin' on you!

text.Cid: Right, got you covered! Yeah. (Starts broadcasting Hymn of the Fayth from ship's speakers) How's that?

text.Rikku: Oh, right on!

text.ACTION: [Everyone listens]

text.Lulu: A singing ship in the sky.

text.Wakka: I hope everyone got the message.

text.Brother: (stands up suddenly and looks ahead) Sin!

text.Wakka: How we gonna get inside?

text.Rikku: Figures.

text.Lulu: Well? Let's go!

text.ACTION: [Yuna and friends dash off; Cid calls after Tidus ... ]

text.Cid: Hey, how you plan on getting inside?

text.Tidus: If we can't get through the mouth, we'll rip open a new one! You with me?

text.Cid: (Cackles) Now that's what I call a plan!

text.Brother: Father! I know what to use!

text.Cid: Aha! Of course!
All right! We'll give that thing a new blowhole. All you gotta do is jump!
I won't tell ya to be careful. Do your worst, kiddo!

text.Brother: Wait! (Clears throat, speaks haltingly) Rikku, you ... guard.

CHOICE.Rin: Any last minute supplies before the showdown?
But of course. Once Sin is gone, we'll need to be rebuilding Home, you see.

CHOICE.Tidus: Man, your dedication is ... really astounding.

CHOICE.ACTION: Talking to airship crew before going outside to fight Sin ...

text.LOCATION: Ramp Down to Airship Level Four

CHOICE.Lakkam: I do not run around in panic! Hope for the best, prepare for the worst!

CHOICE.Judda: Pardon me. So scared was I that I began to tremble all over!

CHOICE.Blappa: Soon is the final battle with Sin! How very excited I am!

CHOICE.Eigaar: If every mouth in Spira sings, we may win this battle.

CHOICE.Berrik: I have faith you will do this thing. I will sing, too, for I believe.

CHOICE.Nimrook: Elder Cid has great courage! I must learn to be like him.

CHOICE.Woman in bikini: Do you have all that you need? Talk to Mister Rin!

CHOICE.Woman in leggings: I will sing too! Good luck!

CHOICE.Al Bhed doing squats: Leave the ship to my hands! You go now to the deck!

CHOICE.Gas mask guy: The gravity, it bends! And with Sin at the center!

CHOICE.Gas mask guy on right: Make sure to check your equipment before going out on deck!

CHOICE.Blond guy on left: You will fight Sin close, no? Beware its toxin!

text.ACTION: [Party takes lift to the outer hull ... ]

text.Rikku: I can hear the song!

text.Lulu: Yes, I can hear the Hymn, too.

text.Rikku: They listened to us!

text.Tidus: We won't let them down! (Walks to edge, then turns back.) Yuna?
You don't need this anymore, right?

text.ACTION: (Holds up sphere she dropped on Gagazet)
(Tosses it overboard)
[ Shipshake! ]

text.Wakka: Hey, guys? Guys? That's not good, ya?

text.ACTION: [Everyone falls down]
[Silence reigns. They get up, look around. Rikku's the first to notice ... ]
[Back on deck, Tidus picks himself up and finds Sin nose to nose with ship again]

text.Cid: (Over ship intercom) Hey, I saw somethin' shine on the base of Sin's arm! I reckon its a weak spot!
What, what?

text.Rikku: Sin's pulling us in!

text.Cid: Everyone, back inside!

text.ACTION: [Fight with right armpit of Sin]
Battle commands during aerial fight with Sin ...

CHOICE.Tidus: Closer! Go closer! or Go back! Farther away!

CHOICE.Rikku: Go near more! or Father! Go far!

CHOICE.ACTION: When ship moves ...

CHOICE.Cid: Yeehaw! We're going in! Hold on!

text.Cid: Here goes! Everyone, hold on to something! Here we go!
Couldn't have done it without you! All right! Everyone look sharp! Time to hit the other side!

text.Rikku: Easy for you to say!

text.ACTION: [Fight Sin's left armpit]

text.Cid: Ready? Fire!
Yeehaw! Where next?
What? We have only begun!

text.Brother: But the main gun, it is broken!

text.Cid: Th-That cannot be!

text.Rikku: The main gun's busted!

text.Cid: Dang it! All right, back inside! Time for another plan!

text.Tidus: No! We're going in! Every blitzer knows: when you got the ball, you gotta score!

text.ACTION: [Boss fight with Sin's buttplug.]

text.Brother: Father! I cannot believe what I see!

text.Cid: Believe it, son! They've done it! It is happening!

text.ACTION: [Yuna and friends enter]

text.Yuna: It's going to come back, isn't it?

text.Cid: What? You're kidding me!

text.Tidus: No! We have to beat the guy inside Sin.

text.Wakka: The Crusaders would be out of a job if it was this easy, ya?

text.Lulu: But it has weakened. I'm sure of it.

text.Rikku: Yeah! We're winning!

text.Cid: All right, I'll do what I can with the main gun! (Leaves to work on repairs)

text.ACTION: Talking to party after Sin plows into Bevelle ...

CHOICE.Rikku: Pop's machina always seem to break down when you need them most.

CHOICE.Lulu: I think it's a little early to start celebrating.

CHOICE.Wakka: Man, we must have hit that thing enough by now!

CHOICE.Auron: This isn't over. Not yet.

CHOICE.Kimahri: Sin still lives. Kimahri knows.

text.LOCATION: Ramp Down to Airship Level Four

CHOICE.Lakkam: I know it will not do to panic, but I do not know how to be calm!

CHOICE.Judda: I wish the battles would be over ...

CHOICE.Blappa: Make this battle the last! We are counting on you!

CHOICE.Eigaar: You will attack Sin head on? Truly a great warrior are you!

CHOICE.Berrik: When the battle is over, we will play blitz once more!

CHOICE.Nimrook: When the time comes, I will fight, Sin! Here is my best shot!

CHOICE.Woman in bikini: It will be a battle most violent! Check that you have all you need!

CHOICE.Woman in leggings: Do not be lazy! Sin is right before us!

CHOICE.Bearded engineer: Our ship is in top shape! Now, go and fell the great Sin!

CHOICE.Gas mask guy: You attack from the front? It is a crazy, but delightful plan!

CHOICE.Blond guy on right: The main gun is finished. It I cannot repair.

CHOICE.Gas mask guy on left: We will charge into Sin, no? Let us do great battle!

text.Cid: We're countin' on you, kid. Yee-ha! Here we go!

text.ACTION: (Click here to skip backtrack)

text.Yuna: I wonder if Sir Jecht is in pain.

text.Tidus: Let's just end this ... quickly. The fayth said they would help us, right?

text.Yuna: It bothers me, the way they said that.
I mean, they've been fighting alongside us this whole time, but now they say they'll help?
Wait! Sin is reborn when Yu Yevon merges with an aeon, isn't that right? If I summon an aeon, Yu Yevon will join with it. But at first, it'll be small, won't it?

text.Tidus: Yeah ... Then, we might be able to beat it without the Final Summoning.

text.Yuna: I don't know. What if Yu Yevon jumps again?

text.Tidus: Then we'll take it down again! We'll fight him until there's no place left to run!

text.Yuna: I never thought it would come down to this.

text.Tidus: Yeah, I know. Hey, the fayth, they're tired of this whole thing, too. Let's let them rest.

text.Yuna: The fayth said it's pointless to keep dreaming. The dream will disappear, he said. What did he mean? And what is it that Yu Yevon is summoning from within Sin?
You won't ... go away, will you?

text.Rikku: (Interrupting over the intercom) Yunie! Guys! Come look! Something's happening to Sin!

text.Cid: Well, son, the main gun is still busted! We can't give you any cover fire!

text.Tidus: Hey, just take us in. We'll do the rest.

text.ACTION: [He looks towards fellow guardians. Lulu and Rikku nod, Wakka raises half a high-five.]

text.Cid: All right. Take us up, flush to the mouth! No mistakes, or I'm gonna tear out that mop you call hair!

text.Brother: Eh ... Trust ... me. Me ... take you there. No problem ... ya?

text.Cid: Here we go!

text.Tidus: Yeah! I'm coming for you, Dad!

text.ACTION: [Boss battle with Sin's Nose]

text.Tidus: Then we will! Let me take front!

text.ACTION: [Seymour waits at the top of the stairs, cackling]
(Cackle)

text.Seymour: (Whispering) Sin has chosen me. I am part of Sin. I am one with Sin, forever. Immortal!

I will learn to control it, from within. I have all the time in the world. Since you were gracious enough to dispose of Yunalesca ... the only means of destroying Sin is forever gone. Now nothing can stop us!
By all means, try! You should thank me.Your death means your father's life!

text.ACTION: [Battle: Die, Seymour, die die DIE.]
If Seymour casts dispel ...

text.Seymour: But there is no salvation for the damned!
Rest in peace, in eternal darkness!

text.ACTION: If Seymour casts Ultima ...

text.Seymour: Let darkness take you!

text.ACTION: If you summon Anima ...

text.Seymour: You would oppose me as well? So be it!
(Stumbles backwards, falls to his knees ... ) No!

text.Wakka: Now! Yuna, send him!

text.Seymour: So it is you, after all, who will send me. But even after I am gone, Spira's sorrow will prevail. (Dissolves into pyreflies ... about time!)

text.Tidus: Sin will be right behind you.

text.ACTION: If you drop by the ship after defeating Seymour ...
Glyph Sealed Door on right, just inside front gate ...

text.Seymour: Ten fiends still seek eternal repose. (After killing ten) The fiends, now freed, release the seal of Yevon!

text.ACTION: [Slog through City of Dying Dreams and Sin — The Nucleus — i.e. the Glade of Annoying Spikes. Finally land in ... ]

text.Jecht: Hah! You got tall, but you're all bones! You eating right, boy?
Well, I am Sin, you know.
Well, then ... I mean ... you know. Let's end this.
(Chuckles) I know, I know. You know what you have to do.

I can't hear the Hymn so well anymore. Pretty soon, I'm gonna be Sin. Completely. I'm glad you're here now. One thing, though ... When it starts, I won't be myself anymore. I won't be able to hold myself back. I'm sorry.

text.Tidus: That's enough. Let's finish this, okay?

text.Jecht: You're right. Well, then ... Let's go!

text.ACTION: [Tidus has second thoughts and lunges to grab him — the party gasps — but he fails to catch Jecht. Jecht falls, transforming into Braska's Final Aeon.]

text.Tidus: I promise this'll be quick! Hit me with all you got, Dad!

text.ACTION: "Talk" during battle with Jecht ...
(Tidus' voice seems to affect Jecht. Jecht's power decreases.)

text.Tidus: You won't beat me this time!

text.ACTION: (Jecht seems torn. Jecht's power decreases.)
[Finally Yu Yevon flees Jecht as a black fluttery blob, the Final Aeon disappears, and the real Jecht lies there. Tidus kneels by him.]

text.Jecht: You'll cry. You're gonna cry. You always cry. See? You're cryin'.

text.Tidus: Right ... We've got a job to do, don't we?

text.Jecht: Good. That's right. You are my son, after all.

text.Tidus: You know ... for the first time, I'm glad ... to have you as my father.

text.ACTION: [Yu Yevon buzzes them]

text.Jecht: Yuna, you know what to do. The aeons ...

text.Bahamut's Fayth: (Appears behind them) We Aeons
(Appears in front of Jecht) Call us!

text.Lulu: Here it comes!

text.ACTION: [The world goes wonky. When (a) reality reasserts itself, they're standing on a giant chained sword floating over an abyss.]
[Yuna summons, reluctantly. They knock down each aeon in turn.]

text.Tidus: Everyone! This is the last time we fight together, okay?

text.Wakka: Huh?

text.Tidus: What I'm trying to say is ... after we beat Yu Yevon, I'll disappear!

text.Lulu: What are you talking about?

text.Rikku: Not now!

text.Tidus: I know it's selfish ... but this is my story!

text.ACTION: [Back in Jecht's Zanarkand, Yuna's sending, but freezes when she sees pyreflies rising from Auron.]
(Strides through them, thumping Kimahri's chest and meeting their eyes ... )
(Dissolves into pyreflies)
